journals.note: Finished journal tasks. Got help from Kevin on VP201 as the website was receiving an unexpected token from the JSON file. The problem was that the JSON file needed to be on one line as opposed to having spaces.

journals.name: Final Week
journals.note: Finished thought of the day tasks and completed the assignment. Gained help from lab session to make the page update as soon as a journal entry is added. Learnt that python must only read a file after the new data has been added to the JSON file for the website to automatically update. The other problem was that the getJournalEntries() needed to be called after adding or deleting a entry from the JSON file.
